data.name: The Divine Speaker: The Sun and the Moon
data.detailed_description:
Check out the game that started it all!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1373950/The_Divine_Speaker/


About the Game



A story from the past...



The Divine Speaker: The Sun and the Moon is the story-rich, 18+ prequel to the hit BL/yaoi game, The Divine Speaker.

Follow alongside Aemyl, the next Speaker, as he fights between his duty and his desire to explore the world with the Prince of Aurelia Cavella, Caspian.

Just what will these two find in their own journey into the forest?

Minimum:

  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
